title.narrative: Zimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations

description.narrative:
To support the scaling up for ZCIEA's revolving loan fund in order to reach new territories, as well as to support trainings on lobbying and advocacy, the revolving loan fund, and ZCIEA's communication system.
The project is aimed at promoting sustainable livelihoods for ZCIEA members through their communities. This project will run through the revolving fund system at group project level as it will seek to continue throughout the ZCIEA Structures from year to year. It will also build on the follow-up of the first project under UUSC, where territories received communication tablets and communication skills. Some received financial literacy and constitutional awareness. The link will give more mileage on mainly the constitutional provisions and international instruments on the right to decent work and an alignment with the recommendation 204 on transitioning of informal economy activities into mainstream activities.
